name: s7-mcp-bridge
description: S7-MCP-Bridge is a MCP Server that connects AI agents to Siemens industrial PLCs (specifically S7-1500 and S7-1200 models).
author: Carlos Grillo

scripts.copy-files: cpy dist/** package*.json node_modules claude_extension/** cldext
scripts.clbundle: npm run copy-files && mcpb pack cldext/ claude_extension/s7-mcp-bridge-v%npm_package_version%.mcpb
